about_the_game:
Plue’s Cute Fantasy Worlds - Magic Days & Scary Nights offers you a mixture of adorable interior tiles, inspired by halloween, magic and scary stuff!

Build your own...

● magic shops
● classrooms
● halloween parties
● crypts
● cute bedrooms
● haunted rooms

All in an art style that fits from magical girl to cutesy horror aesthetics. Enjoy!

This set includes:

● A2 - several carpet & rug autotiles
● A4 - interior wall tiles
● A5 - floor & stair tiles
● B - tiles for halloween parties & cute bedroom/dorm decor
● C - tiles for potion/magic shops
● D - tiles for (witch & wizard) classrooms & haunted rooms
● E - window & door tiles

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
